text:
Admission_through → Direct_Admission → Fifteen percent (15%) of the approved
- Intake of a course is filled under this category as per the Govt. of U.P. and AKTU guidelines
- There is usually a great rush for management quota seats.
- The students need to register themselves early to establish priority.

Admission_through → Direct_Admission → For admission to B. Tech courses
- The candidate must have passed the intermediate examination or equivalent (10+2) with required subject combination
- The admission criteria is defined by the college admission policy.

Admission_through → Direct_Admission → For admission to the first year of MCA (2 years)
- A candidate must have passed a bachelor’s degree course of three years minimum duration from any recognized Indian university or its equivalent.
-  Candidate must have passed Mathematics at 10+2 level
- graduation level and the admission criteria are defined by the college admission policy.

Admission_through → Direct_Admission → For admission to MBA course
- The minimum qualification required is three years of bachelor’s degree in any discipline
- the admission criteria are defined by college admission policy.

Admission_through → Direct_Admission → For admission to PGDM course
- Other criteria defined by the AICTE and affiliating University In PGDM Other criteria defined by the AICTE

Admission_through → Direct_Admission → For admission to M. Tech course
- The minimum qualification required is a bachelor’s degree in a relevant discipline.
- MCA is also eligible for the admission to M. Tech (Computer Science & Engineering)
- The admission criteria are defined by the college admission policy.
